altTitles.ja: アキレウス アルゴスの軍神

description.en: The war begins. The Achaean army, led by Agamemnon, struggles against the Trojan army, which boasts an iron fortress. Achilles and Hector, the prince of Troy, cross swords in the midst of the battle and become attracted to each other. Meanwhile, a tragedy befalls Patroclus, who adores Achilles... This is the conclusion of the first chapter of this turbulent mythological spectacle.
description.ja:
伝説の英雄アキレス戦乙女となって数多の戦場を駆け抜ける!!

開戦。鉄壁の城塞を誇るトロイア軍を前に、アガメムノン率いるアカイアの軍勢は苦戦を強いられる。戦の渦中で剣を交わせ、互いに惹かれ合ってゆくアキレスとトロイの王子ヘクトル。一方、アキレスを慕うパトロクロスにある悲劇が…。激動の神話スペクタクル序章完結編。

title.en: Classmate wa Isekai de Yuusha ni Natta kedo, Ore dake Gendai Nihon ni Okizari ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: クラスメイトは異世界で勇者になったけど、俺だけ現代日本に置き去りにされました

altTitles.en: My Classmates Became Heroes in Another World, But I was Left Behind in Modern Japan

description.en:
"Congratulations! You 25 have been chosen as heroes to save the world!"

Just before summer vacation in their third year of middle school, the class is suddenly transported to another world by the goddess Ashera. The 26 students are given statuses that allow them to use skills and cheat abilities to become heroes in the other world. However, the number of students transported is 25—leaving behind Iori Shu, the boy who had just transferred and wasn’t counted.

While his classmates train in the other world to prepare for their battles as heroes, Shu remains in peaceful Japan, devoting himself to studying the status he was given. Quietly experimenting with his skills, he occasionally uses them to help those around him. But before he realizes it, Shu has become a target of various organizations around the world—!?
description.ja:
「おめでとう！　君たち25人は世界を救う勇者に選ばれました！」

中学3年の夏休み前、突然現れた女神・アシェラによって行われたクラス単位の異世界転移。
26人の生徒は異世界で勇者になれるよう、スキルやチート能力を使うことができるステータスを与えられ転移させられる。しかしその人数は25人――転校したばかりでカウントされていなかった少年・伊織修は現代日本に置き去りにされた。

異世界で鍛練し、来る勇者としての戦いに備えるクラスメイトとは違い、平和な日本で修は与えられたステータスの研究に没頭する。密かにスキルの性能の試行錯誤をしつつ、その力で時折身の回りの人助けをしていた修だが、いつの間にか世界の組織から狙われるような存在になっていて――？

description.en:
This oneshot is about a young boy who hates baseball… until the day a passing stranger teaches him a valuable lesson!  
  
This oneshot was featured in Harta volume 70, which released in December of 2019.

title.en: Migawari Otome no Koufuku-na Yomeiri - Meiko to Musubi no Akashi

altTitles.ja: 身代わり乙女の幸福な嫁入り～めいこと結びのあかし～

description.en:
A story of two people who had a sad fate until they found a new happiness.

The time is the Taisho era.

The orphan Meiko, who suffers from weak eyesight, lives a modest but peaceful life at a temple orphanage. One day, a suspicious person visits the temple and suddenly attacks Meiko.

When she wakes up, she finds that time had rewound several months back. To avoid death, Meiko follows a guide. There she meets her long-lost twin sister, Kanako, the daughter of a marquis... After her parents tell her the story of her birth, Meiko is to marry Matsuwaka Akashi, a military man feared as the "Demon Akashi," as Kanako's substitute-

Top actress Lee Sia has the ability to see ghosts.
After an accident, she wakes up in the body of 'Camilla Sorfelle'.

But here's the problem.

"Oh, Father, help me!"

This woman's fate always ends in death!

I need to extend my life, so might as well talk to the ghosts first.

Ugh, but why do I keep getting involved with people I want to avoid!?

title.en: Tsurenai Hodo Aokute Azatoi Kurai ni Akai

altTitles.ja: つれないほど青くて あざといくらいに赤い

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsurenai Hodo Aokute Azatoi Kurai ni Akai

altTitles.en: So Cold That It's Blue, and Cunning Enough to Be Red

altTitles.es-la: Tan frío como el azul y tan agresivo como el rojo

altTitles.vi: Xanh đến nỗi Lạnh Lùng, Đỏ tới mức Xảo Quyệt

description.en: Is this senior... female? Male? Neutral? Demonic? A transfer student suffering from an incurable disease called curiosity meets a mysterious being (human) who is beautiful, cute, cool, and terrifying. The first of a new generation of horror comic authors presents an abyssal love story, a ghost story to peek into and sensuality to you.
description.ru:
Мой сэмпай... Кто же это? Девушка? Парень? Оно? Демон?.. Главный герой — переведенный ученик старшей школы, страдающий неизлечимым чувством любопытства натыкается на красивое, милое, крутое и опасное создание (человека?). С этого момента и начинаются их необычные отношения.

(Source: mangalib)
description.vi: Liệu senpai này là... Nữ giới? Nam giới? Vô giới? Ác quỷ giới?? Một học sinh chuyển trường mắc một căn bệnh vô phương cứu chữa gọi là sự hiếu kì đã gặp phải một tồn tại bí ẩn dưới hình dạng của một con người vô cùng xinh đẹp và dễ thương nhưng cũng rất lạnh lùng và đáng sợ. Một câu chuyện tình yêu nơi vực thẳm, một câu chuyện ma quái đầy gợi cảm, mang đến cho bạn bởi tác giả đứng đầu về một thế hệ mới của truyện kinh dị...!

altTitles.ja: 雨と君と

description.en: On a rainy summer evening, a woman and a "dog" happened to meet each other and life has never been the same since.
description.ja: 雨の降る日に、１人と１匹は出会いました。“あともうちょっと”がほっこり尊いと話題です。
description.ru: В один дождливый день она подобрала что-то похожее на собаку... Давайте же посмотрим, насколько хитрой может быть эта "собака"...
description.pt-br: Em uma noite chuvosa de verão, uma mulher e um "cachorro" se conheceram e a vida nunca mais foi a mesma desde então.

title.en: A Cool Older Lady Who Drives Me Crazy

altTitles.ja: 僕を狂わすカッコイイお姉さん

altTitles.en: A Cool Older Lady That Makes Me Crazy

altTitles.pt-br: Uma mulher mais velha legal que me deixa louco

altTitles.es-la: Una mujer mayor genial que me vuelve loco

altTitles.vi: Cô nàng hơn tuổi lạnh lùng khiến tôi phát điên

altTitles.en: Ms. Oogami and Keru Bero Suu!

altTitles.ja: 大上さんとケルベロスゥ！

altTitles.zh: 大上同学和可露贝洛苏！

description.en: When Oogami-san was confessed to by one of the three dog eared girls Cer Ber and Us they became friends and started hanging out together. Will this friendship eventually turn into love!? A love story between the three physically identical girls who have totally different personalities and the beautiful lone wolf.
A prince has been cursed to turn into a frog by a witch. Things went wild from there.
description.vi: Một hoàng tử bị biến thành con ếch bởi một mụ phù thủy. Chuyện diễn ra tiếp theo khá là kì cục.

altTitles.zh: 斩灵少女：我契约的全是上古神兵

altTitles.en: Soul-Slaying Girl: All the contracts I contracted are ancient divine weapons.

description.en: Han Zhan traveled through time and space, where the girls could transform into magic weapons and fight under contract. The boy would awaken and become a spiritual contract master, and make a contract with them to resist the insect tide together. As a time traveler, he was shocked when he saw that those who were despised were actually famous ancient magic weapons. [Fuxi Qin], [Demon Refining Pot], [Shennong Ding], [Kunlun Mirror], [Nuwa Stone].

title.en: Isekai NTR ~Shinyuu no Onna wo Saikyou Skill de Otosu Houhou~

altTitles.ja: 異世界NTR～親友のオンナを最強スキルで堕とす方法～

altTitles.th: ISEKAI NTR ~สร้างฮาเร็มโดยไม่ให้พรรคพวกรู้~

altTitles.ko: 이세계 NTR ~절친의 여자를 최강 스킬로 함락시키는 방법~

altTitles.zh-hk: 異世界NTR ～不被同伴發現地開後宮～
異世界NTR～用最強技能令摯友的女人墜落的方法～

altTitles.en: Isekai NTR: Sullying My Best Friend's Women With the Strongest Skill
NTR in Another World: Sullying My Best Friend's Women With the Strongest Skill

description.en:
This shitty world that's nothing but a trashy game, he and I will definitely escape it together. So, all these annoying women trying to take advantage of him are just a nuisance. What's worse, it seems like he's beginning to have some feelings for them.

That's why, for his sake, I'll eat them up first. But, just what is this power…?
description.es: Este mundo de mierda que no es más que un juego basura, él y yo definitivamente escaparemos juntos. Entonces, todas estas mujeres molestas que intentan aprovecharse de él son solo una molestia. Lo que es peor, él parece que está comenzando a sentir algo por ellas. Por eso, por su bien, las comeré primero. Pero, ¿qué es este poder…?

altTitles.ja: 魔男のイチ

description.en: In this world, witches must hunt down their magic! Deep in the forest, the terrifying king of magic and the strongest witch are locked in deadly combat. But suddenly, a young boy joins the fray. His name is Ichi and he is just a hunter. But he has the power to flip the magic world upside down in this magic hunting fantasy epic!
description.ru: В этом мире ведьмы охотятся за своей магией! В глубине леса ужасающая маджика и сильнейшая ведьма схлестнулись в бою не на жизнь, а на смерть. Но вдруг к битве присоединяется молодой парнишка. Его зовут Ити, и он обычный охотник. Но у него есть сила перевернуть весь мир магии с ног на голову в этом эпохальном магическом фэнтези об охоте!
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, as bruxas devem caçar sua magia! Nas profundezas da floresta, o terrível rei da magia e a bruxa mais forte estão presos em um combate mortal. Mas, de repente, um jovem garoto se junta à briga. Seu nome é Ichi e ele é apenas um caçador. Mas ele tem o poder de virar o mundo mágico de cabeça para baixo neste épico de fantasia de caça mágica!

description.en: The arrogant and cold Yu Xingji, the leader of the Twelve constellation deities, traded his memories in exchange for reincarnating a thousand times in order to find his true love. During his 1001st reincarnation, he's reborn into the life of a college professor, where he meets Qin Ling, an aloof young man in possession of strange spiritual powers. When a strange event suddenly happens on the school campus, Yu Xingji couldn’t help but find himself standing in front of Qin Ling to protect him during the most critical moment!While the relentless reincarnation cycles may have erased the memories and appearance of his lover, only the emotions carved in his bones and engraved in the heart will guide them to reunite once again.

altTitles.ja: 焼いてるふたり

altTitles.ru: Брак с Нуля: Как Поджарить Нашу Любовь

altTitles.th: จุดรักเราด้วยเตาถ่าน

description.en: After their fateful encounter through a dating app, Kenta and Chihiro decided to get married with zero days of dating in light of Kenta’s transfer. As a couple who got married without knowing much about each other, they deepen their relationship through their regular weekend BBQs.
description.ja:
マッチングアプリで運命の出会いを果たした、健太と千尋。奥手すぎて最初の一歩を踏み出せずにいるふたりが、健太の浜松への転勤をきっかけに急進展。なんと…交際ゼロ日で結婚することに！　

お互いをよく知らないまま夫婦になったふたりは、毎週末のBBQでじっくり仲を深めていく――。
description.ru: После роковой встречи через приложение для знакомств, Кента и Чихиро решили пожениться с нулевым количеством дней знакомств в свете перевода Кенты. Как пара, которая вышла замуж, не зная многого друг о друге, они развивают свои отношения путём регулярных выходных с барбекю.
description.pt-br: Quando Kenta, de 30 anos, conhece a designer gráfica Chihiro, ele queima seu exterior descolado com sua paixão por churrasco! Agora, após um lampejo de namoro, eles são recém-casados! Embora seus empregos os mantenham separados, eles ainda têm fins de semana juntos para grelhar, e carne boa não é a única coisa que está esquentando neste relacionamento escaldante!

altTitles.ja: Ore-sama Sensei
Ore-sama Teacher
Oresama Sensei

altTitles.th: ฉันนี่แหละอาจาร์

altTitles.ja: 俺様ティーチャー

description.en:
Kurosaki Mafuyu was a juvenile delinquent and head of her gang before her subsequent arrest got her expelled from high school. Now that she's transferred to a new high school, she's determined to become an "ultra-shiny, super feminine high school student." But with a new friend like Hayasaka-kun and a homeroom teacher like Saeki Takaomi (who may be more than he seems), will Mafuyu really be able to live a girly-girl high school life?  
  
**Official Oresama Teacher PV:**  
  
<https://youtu.be/3kzHDkGI_Y8>

altTitles.ja: 瞳ちゃんは人見知り

altTitles.it: Hitomi-chan è timida con gli sconosciuti

description.en: One day, the ordinary 2nd year high schooler Yuu Usami accidentally encounters a big girl with a scary look. Turns out she's glaring at him, but why…?! Although Hitomi Takano looks like she's scary and awkward, she's actually a kind and adorable girl. This one shall be a happy, heartwarming slice-of-life comedy.
description.es:
Un día, el estudiante de 2do año Yuu Yusami se encuentra por accidente con una muchacha grande con una mirada temeraria. Resulta que ella símplemente lo está observando… pero ¿por qué? A pesar de que Hitomi Takano se ve espeluznante y huraña, ella en realidad es querida y adorable. Ésta será una feliz y grata comedia de la vida cotidiana.  
  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Mangaka’s Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/910858)  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/cyorisukenosuke)
description.fr: Un jour, Yuu Usami – lycéen ordinaire en deuxième année – rencontre une grande fille avec un regard effrayant. Elle a l’air de le fusiller du regard, mais pourquoi…?! Pourtant, même si Hitomi Takano fait peur et est maladroite, elle est en réalité une fille gentille et adorable. Bienvenue dans une comédie/tranche de vie qui va vous réchauffer le cœur !
description.ja:
どこにでもいる平凡な高校2年生の宇佐見君は、ある日、偶然に居合わせた"何やら目つきが悪くていろいろとおっきな女の子"に、なぜか睨みつけられてしまい…!?
見た目は怖くて不器用だけど、実は優しくて可愛い三白眼女子の、楽しくてハートフルな日常コメディ…開幕!!
description.ru: Однажды обыкновенный старшеклассник 2-го года Юу Усами случайно встречает большую девушку со страшным взглядом. По какой-то причине она не отрывает от него глаз, но он ведь ей ничего не делал!.. Хотя Хитоми Такано выглядит страшной и неприветливой, на самом деле она добрая и очаровательная девушка.
description.pt-br: Em um dia comum, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, chamado Usami Yuu, se encontra acidentalmente com Takano Hitomi, uma garota alta e que tem um olhar assustador. Acontece que ela está olhando diretamente para ele. Mas embora Hitomi pareça assustadora e desajeitada, na verdade ela é uma garota gentil e adorável que simplesmente quer se tornar mais sociável.

altTitles.ja: かわいそうな妹ちゃん

description.en: Poor little sister who loves her onii-chan
description.pl: Biedna młodsza siostrzyczka, która zakochała się w swoim bracie
description.vi: Cô em gái đáng thương phải lòng anh trai mình

altTitles.ja: スライム聖女

description.en: The weakest monster (slime) who longed to be human is reincarnated as a saint, but with the worst character of all, a villainous noble girl. From the lowest status, hated and resented; an existence where she will be terminated immediately if her true identity as a slime is discovered, she will become a beloved saint in order to live a safe and secure life!
description.ja: 人間に憧れた最弱魔物（スライム）が乗っ取ったのは、聖女だけど性格最悪な極悪令嬢・ジェリィの体だった！　折角人間に成ることが出来たのに、周りの人間たちから恨まれ嫌われているうえに、魔物（スライム）とバレたら即終了のバッドエンドまっしぐら…!?
description.ru: Самый слабый монстр (слайм), мечтающий стать человеком, вселяется в тело злодейки с ужасной репутацией! Если будет раскрыта её истинная сущность, то она будет немедленно уничтожена, поэтому она будет стремиться стать всеми любимой, чтобы жить безопасной и комфортной жизнью!

title.en: Legend of the Galactic Heroes (MICHIHARA Katsumi)

altTitles.ja: 銀河英雄伝説

description.en:
Manga adaptation of 1980s.  
  
Five hundred years ago, Rudolf von Goldenbaum united the disparate governments of humankind and established a mighty human empire, a tribute to his own greatness that stretched across the galaxy. Demanding loyalty and discipline, Rudolf created an order designed to long outlast his own rule; but all human works fade in time. Today, the decaying empire faces the threat of the Free Planets Alliance, and military leaders on both sides jockey for power in the face of a seemingly inevitable conflict. On the side of the empire, the young general Reinhard von Lohengramm sees war as opportunity, and the empire as soft clay ready for his own sculpting. On the side of the alliance, would-be historian Yang Wen-li would like nothing better than to live out his days in peace - but times of war have little use for men who waste their days studying the mistakes of the past. Circumstances will make heroes and villains of both these men, as they write new history one blood-splattered page at a time.  
  


---
description.ru:
История человечества всегда была историей войн, во все времена, во все эпохи. И во все эпохи находятся люди, оставляющие след в истории, чьи имена выжжены на её скрижалях. Этих людей называют героями.  
В третьем тысячелетии, когда люди давно переселились с Земли на просторы Галактики, между абсолютной монархией Галактический Рейх и республикой Союз Свободных Планет уже 150 лет продолжается война. И на озарённом пламенем войны небосклоне зажигаются звёзды героев, судьба которых - изменить мир.

altTitles.ja: 高森くんを黙らせたいっ！！

altTitles.en: I Want to Shut Up Takamori-kun!!

altTitles.vi: Đừng nghĩ thế nữa mà, Takamori-kun!

description.en: Minamikawa-san, a girl with the ability to read minds is curious about the boy sitting next to her, Takamori-kun. It's because Takamori-kun's mind is so damn loud...!!
description.ja: 南川さんは隣の席の高森くんの「ヒミツ」を知っている。それは高森くんの心の声が聞こえるということ。そしてさらに、高森くんは南川さんのことが大好きだということ…!!毎日毎日うるさい高森くんの心の声を黙らせられるのか…!?テレパス青春ラブコメ、開幕です!!
description.vi: Một cô gái có khả năng đọc suy nghĩ người khác và cậu bạn kế bên có máu simp lỏ. Điều gì sẽ chờ đợi cả hai phía trước?

title.en: Boku no Kowareta Seigi wa Loop Suru Isekai de Ai to Tsumi wo Tenbin ni Kakeru

altTitles.ja: ぼくの壊れた正義はループする異世界で愛と罪を天秤にかける

altTitles.en: My Broken Justice Weighs Love and Sin on the Scales in a Looping Parallel World

description.en:
The school is suddenly transported to another world, where it is overrun by monsters and turned into hell.

Okoyo Takumi, who lost his life while trying to escape with his beloved sister, Haruna, realizes that every time he dies he returns to the same time. Takumi is at the mercy of the monsters’ deadly siege and imprisoned in a prison of time that sends him back to the same time every time he dies. He continues to struggle, overcoming the rape and death of his loved ones time and time again. After successfully hunting an orc, a fanfare resonates in Takumi's mind.
description.ja: 突如異世界に転移した学園は、モンスターたちに蹂躙され地獄と化した。最愛の義姉、春名と逃げようとして命を落とした御好巧は自身が死ぬ度に同じ時間に戻っていることに気づく。モンスターたちの死の包囲に翻弄され、死ぬ度に同じ時間に巻き戻される時の牢獄に囚われた巧は、愛する者の凌辱と死を何度も乗り越えて足掻き続け――オークを狩ることに成功した巧の脳裏にファンファーレが響きわたる。

altTitles.ja: ボンバーガール

description.en: Sporadically posted comic pages on the official twitter of the Bombergirl arcade game.

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime

altTitles.fr: Moi, quand je me réincarne en Slime

altTitles.en: In Regards to My Reincarnation as a Slime

altTitles.th: เกิดใหม่ทั้งทีก็เป็นสไลม์ไปซะแล้ว

altTitles.zh-hk: 关于我转生后成为史莱姆的那件事

altTitles.ja: 転生したらスライムだった件

altTitles.es-la: Aquella vez que me convertí en Slime

altTitles.ar: ذلك الوقت الذي تجسدت فيه كسلايم

altTitles.tr: O zaman bir balçık olarak reenkarne oldum
O zaman bir slime olarak reenkarne oldum

altTitles.de: Meine Wiedergeburt als Schleim in einer anderen Welt

description.en:
The ordinary Mikami Satoru found himself dying after being stabbed by a slasher. It should have been the end of his meager 37 years, but he found himself deaf and blind after hearing a mysterious voice.  
He had been reincarnated into a slime!  
  
While complaining about becoming the weak but famous slime and enjoying the life of a slime at the same time, Mikami Satoru met with the Catastrophe-level monster “Storm Dragon Veldora”, and his fate began to move.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10044/episode/317350) (U.S. Only), [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/233-that-time-i-got-reincarnated-as-a-slime), [Azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/that-time-i-got-reincarnated-as-a-slime), [Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/587), [Manga Planet](https://mangaplanet.com/comic/618e32db10673)
description.ru:
37-летний японец-холостяк был зарезан на улице каким-то мерзавцем-грабителем. Тут бы и истории конец, да всё обернулось иначе, неожиданно он переродился слизью в фэнтезийном мире. Но что может сделать, пускай и разумная, но слизь?  


---

**Links:**  
- [Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20736)
description.es-la: Un hombre, que al tratar de salvar a su compañero de trabajo y su novia, fue apuñalado por un ladrón que escapaba. Mientras moría desangrado escuchó una voz extraña. Esta voz escuchó su lamento de haber muerto virgen y a causa de eso le dio la Habilidad Única "Gran Sabio" ¿Fue esto una burla? Ahora él ha reencarnado como un Slime en otro mundo, ¿Será este el inicio de una emocionante aventura?
description.pt-br: Depois de ser morto por um ladrão que fugia, um rapaz normal de 37 anos de idade se encontra reencarnado em um outro mundo como um slime cego com habilidades únicas. Com um novo nome "Rimuru Tempest" ele chegou depois de conhecer seu novo amigo, o "nível catástrofe", Dragão da Tempestade Verudora, ele começa sua vida de slime em outro mundo com seu crescente número de seguidores.

title.en: Tough Gaiden - The Man Who Succeeds the Dragon

altTitles.en: The Man Who Succeeds The Dragon

altTitles.ja: TOUGH 龍を継ぐ男

altTitles.ja-ro: Tough Gaiden - Ryuu o Tsugu Otoko
Tough Gaiden - Ryuu wo Tsugu Otoko

description.en: The series starring one of illegitimate children of Kiryu Miyazawa, Ryuusei Nakamura. Years after Kiibo founded the new dojo, both him and Kiryu mysteriously disappeared. Ryuusei, after losing his mother to cancer, is set to find out about his birth father and his destiny as the evil dragon’s heir, but he is not the only one.
description.ru:
Третья часть саги Саруватари Тэцуи во вселенной "Жесткого". Что произошло после окончания второй части? Куда подевались некоторые старые герои? Где Киичи?  
Ответ на эти и множество других вопросов вы узнаете, начав читать "Жесткий: Наследник Дракона"!

altTitles.ja: いせかいのめいたんてい

description.en: A story about a dull detective mystery fanatic who, upon dying, gets reincarnated into a different world.

Youour Highness- That is absurd!!

"Youour Highness, did you just cough-!!!"

"It's doomed! I've been transmigrated to another world! As an extra chambermaid from a 19+ imperovished novel from the early 2000s!"

For now, I'm trying my best not to upset the male lead's temper so I can survive and return home...

"Youour Highness! Please have mercy!"
"Youour Highness! That is such an absurd thing to say!"
"Could you please stop with that damn antiquated language?!"
Seems like the etiquette here is a bit different from what I know...

Anyway, after defeating an assassin and taking an arrow for him, I feel like I've become somewhat closer to the male lead.

The ominous journal that seems to understand my words, and the male lead, who orders me around, seems a bit fishy too.

"Can I survive here and return home?"

title.en: Akuma to Hito to no Ma

altTitles.ja: 悪魔と人との間

description.en: Miyazaki, a high school boy who has been present where a cute erotic classmate is being attacked by a defect. I suddenly got help, and of course I was messed up ...! The secret relationship between Miyazaki and her begins!
description.ja: 「あの子を救えたら‥‥少しは正しくなれるかな‥」宮崎英司は陰キャな高校１年生。不良から超エロい転校生・黒宮杏伽を助けようとして死んでしまった‥が、淫魔である黒宮さんの力で“悪魔人間”としてよみがえる。以来、黒宮さんとエッチなことを重ねる秘密の関係になるが、そんな二人に悪魔殺し集団“スローターハウス”が襲い来る！

altTitles.ja: サキュバスがやってきたお話

altTitles.en: The Story of a Succubus Who Came to the Human World

description.en: The story of a Succubus who comes to the human world to absorb life force energy. Accidentally, she lives as a child in a strange man's house.

altTitles.ja: 高音さんと嵐ちゃん
王子様の友達
A Prince of a Friend
学園の王子様とハグする話

altTitles.ja-ro: Gakuen no Ouji-sama to Hagu Suru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story About Hugging the School Prince

altTitles.pt-br: A história sobre abraçar o príncipe da escola

description.en:
I'm always at the mercy of the prince!?
A slapstick romantic comedy with a handsome girl!
description.pt-br:
Estou sempre à mercê do príncipe!?
Uma comédia romântica pastelão com uma garota linda!

altTitles.en: I Made a Contract With Myself

description.en: This is a world where awakened people and alienated beasts coexist. Zhang Ping was lucky to become an awakened person, but his ability was rated as useless. He was unwilling to live a mediocre life, so he resolutely swallowed the contract gem that ordinary people avoided like snakes and scorpions, contracted himself, and became his own summoned beast! From then on, the whole world opened up to him. Ever-changing superpowers, endless alienated beasts, and dangerous parallel worlds, everything is possible.

altTitles.ja: 双星の陰陽師

description.en:
Rokuro Enmado is from a family of exorcists who remove evil Kegare, but his real dream is to be a singer, a soccer player, or anything other than an exorcist. When another exorcist, a girl named Benio Adashino arrives, Rokura is suddenly inflamed with competitive spirit and decides to put his natural knack to good use. Their rivalry gets more complicated when they both learn they are the destined "Twin Star Exorcists," two ultimate fighters fated to marry and create the prophesied child who will eliminate all the Kegare in the world.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Twin Star Exorcists** (2019)
description.ru: С давних времён доблестные оммёдзи сражаются со скверной - злобными духами, рождёнными из человеческих страхов, боли и отчаяния. Рокуро с детства мечтал стать сильнейшим оммёдзи и очистить мир от скверны, но ужасная трагедия на долгие годы убила в нём всякое желание бороться. Но кому есть дело до желаний гиперактивного мальчишки, когда от него и талантливой девочки зависит судьба всего мира?
description.tr: Rokuro Enmado, kötü Kegare'yi ortadan kaldıran bir şeytan kovucu ailesindendir, ancak asıl hayali bir şarkıcı, futbolcu ya da şeytan kovucudan başka bir şey olmaktır. Benio Adashino adında başka bir şeytan çıkarıcı kız geldiğinde, Rokura aniden rekabetçi bir ruhla alevlenir ve doğal yeteneğini iyi bir şekilde kullanmaya karar verir. İkisi de kaderlerinde evlenip dünyadaki tüm Kegare'leri ortadan kaldıracak kehanet çocuğunu yaratmak olan iki nihai savaşçı, "İkiz Yıldız Şeytan Kovucu" olduklarını öğrendiklerinde rekabetleri daha da karmaşık bir hal alır.
description.pt-br: Rokuro sonha em se tornar tudo menos um exorcista! Então a misteriosa Benio aparece. Os dois são apelidados de "Exorcistas das Estrelas Gêmeas" e descobrem que estão destinados a se casar... Rokuro pode escapar de ambos os destinos? Quando o melhor amigo de Rokuro, Ryogo, desaparece, Rokuro é forçado a pedir ajuda a Benio para entrar em Magano, o reino dos Kegare, para resgatá-lo!

altTitles.es: La Chica Malvada Se Convierte En Emperatriz

description.en:
The Goddess of War died with grievances. Now after being reborn as Ye Weiyun she is on her way to start a new and happy life.   
  
What revenge? What scum? Violence should be fought with violence!   
  
I will become a rich woman, and build my own harem.   
  
"In the past I got bullied and never resisted. Now, take a good look at the queen I have become."

[Alternative Official Raw: Kuaikan Manhua](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/5975)

altTitles.ja: レベル200最強盗賊の覚醒～終末世界で暴れ狂ってやる～

description.en: A storm of the universe brought species mutations. The poison, undead, giants and monsters in the city roared as they waved their weapons. As the beasts in the woods fought over territorial rights, humans, too, awakened an ability known as star power… Zhou Zheng, without star power, traversed to this apocalyptic world. Using the abilities of the thief character in the game, he destroys the darkness and fog, seeking supreme power!
description.fr:
Un mouvement dans l'univers a apporté des mutations au niveau des espèces vivantes. Un poison, des morts vivants, des géants et des monstres rugissent dans la ville en agitant leurs armes. Alors que des bêtes dans les bois se battent pour des territoires, certains humains éveillent une capacité spéciale connue sous le nom de pouvoir des étoiles... Zhou Zheng, déficient de ce pouvoir, va traverser ce nouveau monde post apocalyptique.
Utilisant ses capacités de voleur issue d'un autre jeu, il détruit ténèbres et brouillard, à la recherche du pouvoir suprême !
description.zh: 一场宇宙风暴带来了物种的变异。城市中的毒尸巨怪，挥动着战斧咆哮。丛林中的异兽们，争夺着领地的主权。人类也觉醒了一种名为星力的异能……没有星力的周正穿越到这个末世。利用游戏中盗贼的角色能力，他将撕毁黑暗迷雾，追逐至高的力量！

altTitles.ja: 猫と竜

description.en: Deep in the forest where ferocious beasts and magical creatures dwell, a cat takes in an orphaned baby dragon as one of her own.
description.ja: 「なぁ、羽のおじちゃん。おいら人間の子供に、魔法を教えてやりたいんだ」。深い深い森の奥。一匹の火吹き竜が、魔法を操る猫たちと暮らしていた。竜は、この森で猫に育てられたのだ。竜の寿命は永い。兄弟猫はとっくに眠りに就き、その子猫が育ち、また新たな命が生まれる。長きにわたり森の猫を守り育てる人間嫌いの竜を、猫たちは「羽のおじちゃん」と呼び、人間は畏怖と敬意を込めて「猫竜」と呼んだ。森の猫は大きくなると、縄張りを求めて巣立っていく。その中には、人間と暮らす猫もいるのだ。冒険の旅に出た王子と、師匠の黒猫。孤児院に住むものぐさ少女と、少女に魔法を教える白猫。冒険者ギルドの看板猫になったのもいる。そして森では、今日も竜が子猫に狩りを教えている。これは、猫と竜と人間の、温かくて不思議な物語。

altTitles.zh: 我成了反派大佬的小娇妻？！

altTitles.zh-hk: 我成了反派大佬的小嬌妻？！

altTitles.ja: 私は悪役の甘えん坊妻になりました

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Cheng Le Fan Pai Da Lao De Xiao Jiao Qi?!

description.en: The dainty flower idol Chen Cong Rong unluckily fell into a trap and awoke to a stunning naked man in her bed! Hahaha, is it okay to be with such a beautiful man? Hang on… Are you telling me I've switched places with the toxic, evil, and manipulative side character who won’t even survive 20% of the plot?! No, I'm definitely not ready to die!! Watch as I keep on living my ideal life!

altTitles.ja: シェパードハウス・ホテル

altTitles.vi: Khách sạn dẫn lối linh hồn

description.en:
In Alberta, Canada, there is a hotel located on the shores of a lake. The hotel, which was the scene of a horrific incident in the past and is surrounded by disturbing rumors, has become a special place that helps souls of the dead move on and finally rest (checkout).

This hotel is called “Shepherd House”. A house of rest that brings healthy relaxation to all souls. And today, another new guest arrives…

---
**Notes:**
- [On hiatus](https://x.com/morikazukisan/status/1786747915152892002)

altTitles.fr: Coma héroïque dans un autre monde

altTitles.ja: 異世界おじさん

description.en: Having survived an isekai for 17 years, 34 year old Ojisan (uncle) returns to modern day Japan. Takafumi, Ojisan's nephew, now gets to witness what throwing a diehard Sega fan into an isekai for 17 years does to various things and people, both past and present.

altTitles.ja: ペーパーブレイバー

description.en:
An RPG-style high school comedy set in present-day Japan, centering around Shiromado Hijiri, a very serious White Mage, and Michibikari Yuuto, a motivationless Hero.

Watch as they futilely struggle to raise the level of the hopeless Hero, day in and day out, in order to one day defeat the Demon Lord.
description.ja: ダメダメ勇者・勇人のレベルを上げるため、日々ムダな努力に励む白魔導士の聖利!!　イタズラ好きの女盗賊・八兵衛と3人で、一応魔王討伐を目指して日々奮闘中!! 爆笑!

altTitles.ja: 茜部先生は照れ知らず

description.en:
Kouki Sakieda is an assistant for Akira Akanabe, a manga artist he admires, who always tries to praise him in some way. Sakieda is worried that he will end up falling in love with her if this situation continues. Then Akanabe unexpectedly asks him to go out with her... 

The story depicts the daily life of Akanabe-sensei, who lavishes praise on Sakieda without embarrassment, and Sakieda, who tries to accept it all gracefully.
description.ja: 『崎枝君ってさ私のこと好き？』　憧れの漫画家・茜部アキラのもとでアシスタントとして働く崎枝コウキ。憧れが次第に恋心へと変わっていたある日、まさかの両想いであることがわかり、なんと二人は恋人同士に！　しかし、茜部先生は思った事を口にしちゃう上に照れ知らずで、コウキを褒め殺してくる！
description.pt-br:
Kouki Sakieda é assistente de Akira Akanabe, uma mangaká que ele admira. Ela sempre tenta elogiá-lo de alguma forma. Sakieda está preocupado que possa acabar se apaixonando por ela se essa situação continuar. Então, inesperadamente, Akanabe o convida para sair...
A história retrata o dia a dia da Sensei Akanabe, que distribui elogios a Sakieda sem qualquer constrangimento, e de Sakieda, que tenta aceitar tudo com naturalidade.

altTitles.ja: この関係は合法です!

description.en:
YES Sister, NO Touch!

Kouta, who is extremely siscon, decides to live alone in order to "escape from his little sister ". One day, however, he picks up a runaway girl named Ui, who is full of younger sisterly feelings. Although she looks and acts like a child, she is in fact a beautiful 19-year-old girl with big tits!

Protect his sister? or Crossing the line? The days of agony begin!
description.ja: YESシスター、NOタッチ!?極度のシスコンの洸太は、「脱・妹」を目指し一人暮らしをすることに。だがある日、妹感満載の家出少女・初（うい）を拾ってしまう。顔もしぐさも幼い初だが、実は19歳の巨乳美少女だった！妹を守る？一線を超えちゃう!?悶々の日々が始まる！

title.en: Saijaku Tamer wa Gomi Hiroi no Tabi o Hajimemashita

altTitles.ja: 最弱テイマーはゴミ拾いの旅を始めました。
最弱テイマーはゴミ拾いの旅を始めました。＠COMIC

altTitles.ja-ro: Saijaku Tamer wa Gomi Hiroi no Tabi wo Hajimemashita

altTitles.en: The Weakest Tamer Began a Journey to Pick up Trash
The Weakest Tamer Started a Garbage-Picking Journey

altTitles.fr: La dresseuse sans étoiles parcourt le monde pour récolter des déchets

altTitles.ru: Слабейшая укротительница в путешествии по сбору мусора

altTitles.th: การผจญภัยของเทมเมอร์มือใหม่ กับสไลม์สุดด๋อย

altTitles.ko: 최약 테이머는 폐지 줍는 여행을 시작했습니다

altTitles.zh: 最弱的驯养师开启的捡垃圾的旅途

altTitles.id: Penjinak terlemah mulai berkelana untuk memungut sampah

altTitles.uk: Найслабша приборкувачка почала свою подорож зі збирання сміття

altTitles.id: Pawang Terlemah Mulai Berpetualang Menjadi Pemulung

description.en:
When Ivy was born into this world, she remembered her past life. Remembering her preincarnation, she strove to avoid strife. But fate curdled at the status check, when kids learn who they are. For she had only one skill – Taming – and not a single star. Ivy was weak from the start – at most, she could tame a slime. And in her world, most people did not give the weak their time. Only one woman in her village would treat her as her own. But after she died, Ivy got the hint and ran from home. While on the lam, she met a tiny slime and made Sora its name.  And such begins the heart-warming survival story of a small girl who can tame.

- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9629ex/)
description.fr:
Dans un monde fantasy où l'avenir de chacun est déterminé par les "skills" révélés durant l'enfance, la jeune Ivy se voit attribuer le métier de dresseuse de monstres au rang le plus bas qui soit : sans-étoile. Rejetée par son village, elle entame alors un voyage aux côtés de Sora, un slime tout faible, seul monstre qu'elle ait réussi à apprivoiser.
La plus faible des dresseuses et le plus faible des monstres parviendront-ils à survivre dans ce monde rude et sans pitié... ?

title.en: Osananajimi no S-kyuu Party kara Tsuihou sareta Seijuutsukai.: Bannou Shien Mahou to Nakama wo Fuyashite Saikyou e!

altTitles.en: The Beast Tamer Was Fired From His Childhood Friends' S-Rank Party

altTitles.ja: 幼馴染のS級パーティーから追放された聖獣使い。万能支援魔法と仲間を増やして最強へ！

description.en:
From MangaUpdates:

A beast tamer without a familiar, Lock had been supporting his friends in an S Rank party until they finally decided to use him as a decoy and abandoned him. After a conversation with the Fenrir his party was attacking, it chose to serve him as his familiar. By using and expanding the [Mini Monster Garden], Lock gathers more and more familiars to form the strongest- and cutest- party ever. Behold, a fantasy where men and beasts go on adventures together.

altTitles.es: El misterio del Santo Grial en la Capital Imperial  - Fate/type Redline

altTitles.en: Grail Mystery in the Imperial Capital - Fate/type Redline

altTitles.ru: Судьба/Линия Фронта: Предание о Граале в имперской столице
Судьба/тип Предел: Сказание о Граале в имперской столице

altTitles.ar: لغز الكأس في العاصمة الإمبراطورية - فيت/تايب ريدلاين

altTitles.ja: 帝都聖杯奇譚 Fate/type Redline

altTitles.id: Misteri Cawan di Ibu Kota Kekaisaran - Fate/Type Redline

altTitles.vi: Truyền Kỳ về Chén Thánh Đế Đô - Fate/Type Redline

description.ar: إعادة صنع لقصة حرب الكأس الإمبراطورية من مانغا كوها-إيس. يُنقل البطل إلى الماضي كي يشارك في حرب الكأس المقدسة وسط الحرب العالمية الثانية.
description.en: Remake of the Imperial Grail War from the Koha-Ace manga. The protagonist is Akagi Kanata, who gets transported 75 years to the past to participate in a Holy Grail War in the midst of World War 2.
description.es: Remake de la Guerra del Grial Imperial, manga publicado en la revista Koha-ace. Nuestro protagonista es Kanata Akagi, un chico de secundaria normal que de un día para otro es transportado 75 años al pasado para participar en una Guerra del Grial en medio del Japón de la Segunda Guerra Mundial.
description.fr: Remake de la guerre du Graal impérial tiré du manga Koha-Ace. Le protagoniste est Akagi Kanata, qui est transporté 75 ans dans le passé pour participer à une guerre du Graal en plein milieu de la Seconde Guerre mondiale.
description.pt: Remake da guerra do graal imperial do mangá Koha-Ace. O protagonista é Akagi Kanata, que é transportado 75 anos para o passado para participar de uma Guerra do Santo Graal no meio da Segunda Guerra Mundial.
description.ru: Ремейк пародийной манги KOHA-ACE GO, изображавшей Войну Святого Грааля на Дальнем Востоке в юмористическом стиле. Примечательно, что в оригинальной сюжетной линии фигурировали персонажи из cерии «Tsukihime». Благодаря магическому артефакту Акаги Каната, потомок изжившего себя магического рода, переносится в Токио 1945-го года. Ещё полыхают огни Второй мировой Войны, но в её тени происходит другая битва — Война за Святой Грааль, сражение между магами и их фамильярами, могущественными героями прошлого. Вместе с Фудзимией Цукумо, магом, которая видит в Войне Грааля свой единственный шанс, Каната призывает Слугу сильнейшего класса Сэйбер — девушку-самурая в бирюзовом хаори. Ситуация кажется безнадёжной, но возможно, именно у Канаты может оказаться ключ к тому, как закончится эта Война.
description.vi:
Bản remake của bộ Cuộc Chiến Chén Thánh Đế Đô từ manga Koha-Ace. 
Kể về Kanata Akagi, một thanh niên bình thường thuộc một gia tộc pháp sư sắp suy tàn sống từ thời hiện đại bị du hành thời gian về quá khứ năm 75, và tham gia Cuộc Chiến Chén Thánh thời điểm đó.

description.en: Somewhere in Tokyo, there is a room. In that room is a black sphere. Periodically, people who should otherwise have died are transferred to the room. There, the sphere gives them special suits and weapons, and sends them out on a mission to kill aliens here on Earth. While these missions take place, the rest of the world is largely oblivious to them. These missions are lethal–few participants survive them. The sphere calls the shots, and it's not the slightest bit nice. Its name… Gantz.
description.pl: Manga, która wstrząsnęła światem otaku. Strzelaniny, kosmici, zabójcza gra, krew, flaki, seks – czyli to, co tygryski lubią najbardziej.
description.ru: Где-то в Токио в огромном здании есть комната, посреди которой стоит чёрный шар. Внутри него находится существо, похожее на человека. Все называют его Ганц, но кто он и откуда пришёл в наш мир — неизвестно.Из этой комнаты нельзя выйти ни через двери, ни через окна. Есть только один путь — взять в руки оружие, надеть защитный костюм и стать освободителем Земли от пришельцев. Как попасть в эту странную комнату? Очень просто — нужно всего лишь умереть. Однако, кто стоит за всем этим, кто раздаёт оружие, кто разрешает умершим людям вернуться в мир живых? Да и тот ли это мир, в котором они жили прежде?

title.en: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 1-bu 「Hon ga Nai nara Tsukureba Ii!」

altTitles.en: Ascendance of a Bookworm ~I'll do anything to become a librarian~ Part 1 「If there aren't any books, I'll just have to make some!」

altTitles.fr: La Petite faiseuse de livres - Ascendance of a Bookworm

altTitles.ja: 本好きの下剋上 ～司書になるためには手段を選んでいられません～ 第一部 「本がないなら作ればいい！」

altTitles.ja-ro: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 1-bu 「Hon ga Nai nara Tsukureba Ii!」

altTitles.pt-br: Ascendência de Uma Amante de Livros: Parte 1 - Farei qualquer coisa para me tornar uma bibliotecária「Se não houver livros, terei que fazer alguns!」

altTitles.vi: Cuộc nổi dậy của nàng mọt sách ~Để trở thành thủ thư, tôi sẽ làm mọi cách~ Phần 1: Không có sách? Tôi sẽ làm ra chúng!

description.en:
A certain college girl who's loved books ever since she was a little girl dies in an accident and is reborn in another world she knows nothing about. She is now Myne, the sickly five-year-old daughter of a poor soldier. To make things worse, the world she's been reborn in has a very low literacy rate and books mostly don't exist. She'd have to pay an enormous amounts of money to buy one. Myne resolves herself: If there aren't any books, she'll just have to make them! Her goal is to become a librarian. This story begins with her quest to make books so she can live surrounded by them! Dive into this biblio-fantasy written for book lovers and bookworms!  
  
Adapted from [web novel (raw)](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4830bu/) / light novel of same name.
___
**Character Designer:** [Shiina You](https://mangadex.org/author/bf3b6af9-eac9-4886-be15-bc4a75640ede)
description.pt-br: Urano, uma viciada em livros que finalmente conseguiu um emprego como bibliotecária na universidade, tristemente morreu logo após terminar a faculdade. Ela renasceu como a filha de um soldado num mundo onde a taxa de alfabetismo é baixa e livros são escassos. Não importa o quanto ela quisesse ler, não havia nenhum livro a sua volta. O que uma rato de biblioteca fará sem livros? Fazê-los, é claro. Seu objetivo é virar uma bibliotecária! Então para poder mais uma vez viver rodeada de livros, ela mesma precisa começar a fazê-los.

title.en: That Time I Was Blackmailed By the Class's Green Tea Bitch

altTitles.zh: 关于被班上绿茶威胁那件事

altTitles.zh-ro: Guānyú bèi bān shàng lǜchá wēixié nà jiàn shì

altTitles.zh-hk: 關於被班上綠茶威脅那件事

altTitles.fr: La fois où la garce manipulatrice [garce au thé vert] de ma classe m'a fait chanter

description.en:
Green Tea Bitch (n.): A woman who pretends to be pure and innocent but is in fact manipulative and calculating.

When school ends, a good honor student is threatened by the class's green tea bitch.
"I never thought a wide-eyed goody-two-shoes like you would get up to something like that."
"If you don't want me to expose your shameful secret..."

A cute romance that stems from a misunderstanding begins in *That Time I Was Blackmailed By the Class's Green Tea Bitch*!

altTitles.th: คนเดือด เมืองดิบ

altTitles.ja: サンケンロック

description.en: Ken, a young Japanese guy, is in love with a young Korean girl, Yumin. He followed her in Korea and wants to become a policeman just like her. But then, he finds himself at the head of a local gang. What will happen to Ken?
description.pt-br: Ken, é um jovem delinquente japonês, ele é apaixonado por uma garota que na verdade não é japonesa e sim coreana, seu verdadeiro nome é Yumin, e ela tem o sonho de voltar pra coreia e ser tornar uma policial. Depois de muito tempo, Ken consegue informações sobre Yumin e vai para coreia tentar virar policial junto com Yumin, mas acaba se envolvendo com os “Jobok” (Máfia Coreana) e acaba se tornando um, como será a vida do Ken como um Jobok?

altTitles.th: เบอร์เซิร์ก

altTitles.ja: ベルセルク

description.en:
Guts, known as the Black Swordsman, seeks sanctuary from the demonic forces attracted to him and his woman because of a demonic mark on their necks, and also vengeance against the man who branded him as an unholy sacrifice.

Aided only by his titanic strength gained from a harsh childhood lived with mercenaries, a gigantic sword, and an iron prosthetic left hand, Guts must struggle against his bleak destiny, all the while fighting with a rage that might strip him of his humanity.  
  
***Won the 6th Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize Excellence Award in 2002.***

---

Note: Following Miura Kenta's death in 2021, the series has been taken over by Kouji Mori, who supervises the series with art done by Studio Gaga.
description.es: Guts, conocido como el Espadachín Negro, busca refugio de las fuerzas demoníacas que se sienten atraídas por él y su mujer debido a una marca demoníaca en el cuello, además de vengarse del hombre que lo marcó como un sacrificio impío. Únicamente con la ayuda de su fuerza titánica, adquirida tras una dura infancia vivida con mercenarios, una espada gigantesca y una prótesis de hierro en la mano izquierda, Guts deberá luchar contra su sombrío destino, al tiempo que combate con una rabia que podría despojarle de su humanidad.
description.ru: Гатс – Черный Мечник, за которым охотятся демоны. Мечник стремится найти все убежища демонов и отомстить человеку, сделавшего их него «жертвенную овечку». Черный Мечник противостоит жестокой судьбе благодаря непоколебимой воле, невероятной силе, и, конечно же, меча. Постоянные сражения со злом приближает Гатса к параллельному миру тьмы, лишая его человечности. Берсерк – сложная, но сильная история о сражениях и злой судьбе.
description.th:
เบอร์เซิร์ก เป็นชื่อมังงะ แนวดาร์ค แฟนตาซี ของญี่ปุ่น วาดโดยเคนทาโร่ มิอุระ มีการดำเนินเรื่องเกิดขึ้นในยุคกลางของยุโรป โดยได้รับอิทธิพลมาจากโลกแห่งจินตนิมิตด้านมืด มีตัวละครเอกของเรื่องคือ กัทส์ ทหารรับจ้างผู้โดดเดี่ยวและ กริฟฟิท หัวหน้าของกลุ่มทหารรับจ้างที่รวมตัวกันภายใต้ชื่อ กองพันเหยี่ยว

----
 [Shopee (ไทย)](https://shopee.co.th/berserk%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%8C%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%8B%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%81-%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%B4%E0%B9%8A%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%84-%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A1-1-20-%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A1%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B7%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B6%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%87-i.63434898.1855330863)
description.tr:
Kara Kılıç Ustası olarak anılan Guts, vücutlarındaki şeytani damga yüzünden onlara musallat olan şeytani güçlerden, kadınını ve kendisini korumanın bir yolunu aramaktadır. Aynı zamanda onu damgalayan ve bir kurban konumuna düşüren adamdan intikam almaya çalışmaktadır. Paralı askerlerle geçirdiği zorlu çocukluk yıllarının getirdiği tecrübeler sayesinde elde ettiği büyük gücü, devasa bir kılıç ve protez bir kol ile destekleyen Guts, karamsar kaderiyle mücadele etmek zorundadır. Tüm bunları yaparken, insani benliğini kaybetmesine neden olabilecek öfkeyle başa çıkmalıdır. 

TheWildDeer'dan Dorylaion tarafından biraz yorum katılarak sitedeki ingilizce açıklamadan çevrilmiştir.
description.uk: Його ім'я Ґатс, Чорний Мечник. Він могутній воїн, про якого говорять лишень пошепки. У нього є велетенський меч , рука зі заліза й шрами від незліченних боїв і тортур. А ще його плоть позначена Тавром — нечестивим символом, який притягує сили пітьми й робить Ґатса їхньою жертвою. Але Ґатс не прийме таку долю спокійно: він порубає на фарш війська проклятих, як і будь-кого, кому стане дурості стати на його шляху! Ґатс іде в товаристві ельфа Пака (більше докучайла, ніж товариша) темним і закривавленим шляхом, який приведе лише до загибелі... Чи помсти.
description.es-la: Guts, conocido como el Espadachín Negro, busca refugio de las fuerzas demoníacas que se sienten atraídas por él y su mujer debido a una marca demoníaca en el cuello, además de vengarse del hombre que lo marcó como un sacrificio impío. Únicamente con la ayuda de su fuerza titánica, adquirida tras una dura infancia vivida con mercenarios, una espada gigantesca y una prótesis de hierro en la mano izquierda, Guts deberá luchar contra su sombrío destino, al tiempo que combate con una rabia que podría despojarle de su humanidad.
description.pt-br: Guts, conhecido como o Espadachim Negro, busca refúgio das forças demoníacas atraídas por ele e sua mulher por causa de uma marca demoníaca em seus pescoços, e também vingança contra o homem que o marcou como um sacrifício profano.  Ajudado apenas por sua força titânica adquirida de uma infância dura vivida com mercenários, uma espada gigantesca e uma mão esquerda protética de ferro, Guts deve lutar contra seu destino sombrio, enquanto luta com uma raiva que pode despojá-lo de sua humanidade.
